blog.name: satoshi-mochida
blog.title: Not Word With Goods
blog.description:
Hello. My name is Satoshi Mochida. My name comes from a character from the Corpse Party games.
(Sorry, this is not a Role Playing blog.)
I'm a "Tales of" and Higurashi fan. I like other stuff, but those are two main things I like.
I am the moderator of these confession blogs:
http://hellyeahgrowlanserconfessions.tumblr.com/
http://hellyeahsakurawarsconfessions.tumblr.com/
http://nasuverseconfessions.tumblr.com/
Other series I like include:
Harvest Moon
Rune Factory
Pokemon
Digimon
.hack
Super Mario
Sonic the Hedgehog
Final Fantasy
Shin Megami Tensei
Type-Moon related works.
Growlanser
Kingdom Hearts
DJ Max series
Sakura Wars
I'll probably add more later.
Gamertags:
PS3: ani12jb
Xbox 360: Ani12JB
3DS Friend Code: 0919-9501-9503
I mostly post info and trailers for new or upcoming games from other sites or users., though I'm now reblogging a LOT of fan art now.

summary:
Pairings: Peter Parker!Best Friend x Reader
Summary: Peter is worried about you because he can’t reach you, your phone is off...
body:
Serendipity

Pairings: Peter Parker!Best Friend x Reader

Summary: Peter is worried about you because he can’t reach you, your phone is off which is very unusual for you. He thinks it might have something to do with your Depression and that something happened to you.

Word Count: 1,763

Authors Note: This Story is kinda based on true stories out of my own life, really personal. I got inspired to write this because of a really good friend of mine, who helps me to get through everything. (Warnings: Depression/Toxic Relationship) 

>>Serendipity -  the occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way.<<

________________________________

“What’s going on?” Ned asked curious, as he noticed Peter’s nervous look, while he was texting on his phone. “Its just another competition, you already did this a couple of times.” He tried to calm his friend down.

Peter noticed that Ned was probably talking to him about the Academic Decathlon but he perceived almost nothing. Peter was so focused on his phone, he was trying to reach you since yesterday when he left.

“Damn it!” Peter said frustrated, then he finally noticed Ned as he sat down next to him. “I can’t reach her. Somethings going on.”

Ned finally understood why Peter didn’t listen to him, it was because of you, his best friend. Peter was always worried about you when he wasn’t around, even more when your relationship with your boyfriend turned into something intoxicating for you.

“Maybe Y/N’s Phone is just off.”

Peter looked at him. “You really think, that the phone of the most addicted texting person, is off?” He asked in a sarcastic tone and tried to call you again. “Hey Y/N, please call me back, I’m really worried.”

Ned shrugged with his shoulders. He knew that Peter was probably right and something happened between Tyler and you again. But still, he wanted to calm his best friend.

“Okay, maybe you’re right but Y/N would’ve texted you if it was urgent. When her phone is off, then maybe she want’s to be alone.” Ned tried to sound convincing.

Peter looked out of the window and thought about what you’d do right now. He was the only one you talked to when you felt bad. 

Peter and you were best friends since you were children, you two talked about anything and everything. After 6 months, when a Spider bit him and gave him his powers, he was honest with you about him being Spider-Man. You were so amazed about how much he trusts you, that you decided to be honest with him too and told him about your real condition of your depression. 

At first you learned how to handle it on your own, still with some medication, but with the help of your family and friends and some happy days, you could’ve been “healed”. But as your relationship with Tyler started to become toxic, your depression became worse and the only person you talked about it with honesty was Peter, because he was always the one who tried to understand you and never judged you in anyway.

                                    ~*~

One Day later:

Peter and his Team had won the competition and made their way back to school. When he arrived at school, he expected you to wait for him already but no one was there. 

Peter decided to go to your house, to look for you. You didn’t live far away from Peter, just four blocks. You had a nice house, normal parents and besides the depression a good life.

Your parents loved Peter, they you’d rather see him as your boyfriend than Tyler, especially your Mom. She saw how you became somehow addicted to him and did nearly anything he wants. Sometimes she couldn’t recognize her own daughter, who was once so confident, wild and strong woman.

Peter ring the bell at the door and waited. He tried to stay calm, even when all he wanted to to was run into your house and look if you’re okay.

“Hello Peter, how was Washington?” Your Mother greeted him smiling.

Peter smiled soft. “It was good, Mrs. Y/L/N. Is Y/N at home?”

“Unfortunately not, shall I tell her something when she gets back?” 

Peter tried to cover his disappointment with a friendly smile. “Just tell her that I was here.”

Your mother nodded. “It was nice to see you. You can come on Saturday and eat dinner with us.” 

“It was nice to see you too and of course, I’ll be there!” 

Your mother smiled again, then she closed the door. Peter tried to think about all your favorite hiding spots and thought about on which of them he would look first. But he noticed that he still had his suitcase and should probably tell May that he’s back.

                                   ~*~

Peter made his way home, still thinking about if you’re alright and mostly where you could be.

“Hey Aunt May, I’m home!”

Nobody responded but Peter heard May singing in the shower. He chuckled a little. Not because her singing was bad but because he knew what was happening as soon as she comes out of the shower. May sang her favorite 80 or 90 songs always with passion, also really loud.. and every time she comes out of the shower, May would deny that she sang at all.

                                    ~*~

Peter went into his room and put his earphones in. He was listening to the Playlist you two created on Spotify, with nearly any genre in it.

He couldn’t believe his eyes as he saw no other but you, sitting on his bed with red eyes and red cheeks. You had climbed the fire escape up and sneaked into his room.

Peter pulled out his earphones. He saw that a tear, you were probably trying to hide, rolled down your face. You quickly wiped it away but noticed the look in Peter’s eyes.

He didn’t even had to hear what Tyler did again, he just wanted to go out and punch that guy in the face like he deserved it so many times.

Peter closed the door gently behind him. He put his suitcase down, then he walked over to you. 

“Hey, sweetie.” He greeted you and laid his arm around you. 

You let yourself fall into his lap and laid on his leg. He strokes your hair soft. Peter knew you’d talk when you were ready to. To force you to tell him something would just push him away, even when he wanted to help you, he knew that being there was enough for you.

                                     ~*~

You started to cry but made no noise. Thats how Peter knew it was really bad, you didn’t even sob. Just tears rolling down your face, on Peters Jeans.

“We fought again, same damn matter. I just can’t trust him and I probably never will.” You sighed.

Peter stroke your hair again. “I don’t know how much we talked about this and I don’t know how much I’ve to say this to you but Y/N, he cheated on you. Tyler did it physically and emotionally. He’ll always flirt with others and even if you don’t see it because he probably deletes it, he’ll always text with others.”

You knew Peter was right. It was the same your mom told you a hundred times.You knew that Tyler wasn’t good for you in anyway, maybe he once was but that was a long time ago. Now all that the relationship was giving you, were toxic thoughts.

“I don’t know why I can’t break up with him.. I try and I’m always just one step away but then, when i’m about to say it, I stop. I know you’re right and even when you think, I wouldn’t listen to you and do what I want anyways, I do listen and I know what I should do. I just don’t know whats wrong with me that I stay after everything he did.” You admitted

It hurt Peter to hearing you talk like this. He missed how happy you were before Tyler. How nobody could steal you confidence, how you had to tell him everything would be alright, when Flash locked him in a locker everyday.

“Tyler abused you with everything he did, it’s no wonder that you can’t trust him. I mean he has giving you no reason too. yes, he always say’s he’s sorry and promises to not do it again but in the end-”

“-It all starts again.” You finished Peters words.

“And the worst of all is, that he is the reason why you’re getting sicker. I noticed that you became a bit thinner. He stresses you so much that you forget to eat or can’t eat. Your depression grows because of him. The only reason why you won’t leave him is because of your fears.”

You got up and looked at him in confusion. You knew that he new about anxiety of being alone but you never told him about anything else.

“Y/N, I know you better than I know myself..” Peter hesitated to say what he really thought but he knew you had to learn it the hard way. “Maybe you feel like your identity is in him. Maybe you feel like you don’t understand what life would be like without him. Maybe you feel like you just can’t emotionally handle the change and everything is hitting you too fast, for you to even have a moment to breath. Maybe you feel that way. And if you do, you will live past it.”

You were surprised about his words. You two had a lot of talks about your situation with Tyler, how much he had hurt you and you told him a lot of times how you felt, when your depression was hitting you again. But never would you have ever thought that he actually understood your feelings better than you did.

His words, everything he said was the pure truth. This was how you felt, this were your fears and you had no idea how to overcome them.

“You’ll live past it and I’ll be with you every step of the way. I won’t leave you and I’ll also tell you this a hundred times more, hell, I’ll tell it a thousand times everyday if it helps. And if you don’t want to sleep alone, you know my window is always open. I’m hear and we’ll get through this.”

You started crying again. 

“No, no, no. Hush.” Peter said and took you into his arms. “What did I say, what did I do wrong? I’m sorry that I was so hard on you but-”

You looked at him with a smile. “You did nothing wrong, you did everything right, Parker.” You wiped your tears away and hugged him. “You’re the only person I believe when you say you won’t leave me and I’m happy to have you. Happy that you always listen, even when its the same shit all over again.”

Peter smiled and kissed the top of your head. “I’ll always be there for you.”

________________________

Sorry for the grammer mistakes, I’ll take care of them in a few days but I really wanted to post this. Hope you like it and leave some comments! <3

Serendipity

Pairings: Peter Parker!Best Friend x Reader

Summary: Peter is worried about you because he can’t reach you, your phone is off which is very unusual for you. He thinks it might have something to do with your Depression and that something happened to you.

Maybe you feel like you don’t understand what life would be like without him. Maybe you feel like you just can’t emotionally handle the change and everything is hitting you too fast, for you to even have a moment to breath. Maybe you feel that way. And if you do, you will live past it.”

You were surprised about his words. You two had a lot of talks about your situation with Tyler, how much he had hurt you and you told him a lot of times how you felt, when your depression was hitting you again. But never would you have ever thought that he actually understood your feelings better than you did.

“You’ll live past it and I’ll be with you every step of the way. I won’t leave you and I’ll also tell you this a hundred times more, hell, I’ll tell it a thousand times everyday if it helps. “No, no, no. Hush.” Peter said and took you into his arms. “What did I say, what did I do wrong? I’m sorry that I was so hard on you but-”

You looked at him with a smile. “You did nothing wrong, you did everything right, Parker.” You wiped your tears away and hugged him. “You’re the only person I believe when you say you won’t leave me and I’m happy to have you. Happy that you always listen, even when its the same shit all over again.”

Peter smiled and kissed the top of your head. “I’ll always be there for you.”

________________________

Sorry for the grammer mistakes, I’ll take care of them in a few days but I really wanted to post this. Hope you like it and leave some comments! <3

“-It all starts again.” You finished Peters words.

“And the worst of all is, that he is the reason why you’re getting sicker. I noticed that you became a bit thinner. He stresses you so much that you forget to eat or can’t eat. Your depression grows because of him. The only reason why you won’t leave him is because of your fears.”

You got up and looked at him in confusion. You knew that he new about anxiety of being alone but you never told him about anything else.

“Y/N, I know you better than I know myself..” Peter hesitated to say what he really thought but he knew you had to learn it the hard way. “Maybe you feel like your identity is in him. Maybe you feel like you don’t understand what life would be like without him. Maybe you feel like you just can’t emotionally handle the change and everything is hitting you too fast, for you to even have a moment to breath. Maybe you feel that way. And if you do, you will live past it.”

You were surprised about his words. You two had a lot of talks about your situation with Tyler, how much he had hurt you and you told him a lot of times how you felt, when your depression was hitting you again. But never would you have ever thought that he actually understood your feelings better than you did.

His words, everything he said was the pure truth. This was how you felt, this were your fears and you had no idea how to overcome them.

“You’ll live past it and I’ll be with you every step of the way. I won’t leave you and I’ll also tell you this a hundred times more, hell, I’ll tell it a thousand times everyday if it helps. And if you don’t want to sleep alone, you know my window is always open. I’m hear and we’ll get through this.”

You started crying again. 

“No, no, no. Hush.” Peter said and took you into his arms. “What did I say, what did I do wrong? I’m sorry that I was so hard on you but-”

You looked at him with a smile. “You did nothing wrong, you did everything right, Parker.” You wiped your tears away and hugged him. “You’re the only person I believe when you say you won’t leave me and I’m happy to have you. Happy that you always listen, even when its the same shit all over again.”

Peter smiled and kissed the top of your head. “I’ll always be there for you.”

________________________

Sorry for the grammer mistakes, I’ll take care of them in a few days but I really wanted to post this. Hope you like it and leave some comments! <3
trail.content:
Serendipity

Pairings: Peter Parker!Best Friend x Reader

Summary: Peter is worried about you because he can’t reach you, your phone is off which is very unusual for you. He thinks it might have something to do with your Depression and that something happened to you.

Word Count: 1,763

Authors Note: This Story is kinda based on true stories out of my own life, really personal. I got inspired to write this because of a really good friend of mine, who helps me to get through everything. (Warnings: Depression/Toxic Relationship) 

>>Serendipity -  the occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way.<<

________________________________

“What’s going on?” Ned asked curious, as he noticed Peter’s nervous look, while he was texting on his phone. “Its just another competition, you already did this a couple of times.” He tried to calm his friend down.

Peter noticed that Ned was probably talking to him about the Academic Decathlon but he perceived almost nothing. Peter was so focused on his phone, he was trying to reach you since yesterday when he left.

“Damn it!” Peter said frustrated, then he finally noticed Ned as he sat down next to him. “I can’t reach her. Somethings going on.”

Ned finally understood why Peter didn’t listen to him, it was because of you, his best friend. Peter was always worried about you when he wasn’t around, even more when your relationship with your boyfriend turned into something intoxicating for you.

“Maybe Y/N’s Phone is just off.”

Peter looked at him. “You really think, that the phone of the most addicted texting person, is off?” He asked in a sarcastic tone and tried to call you again. “Hey Y/N, please call me back, I’m really worried.”

Ned shrugged with his shoulders. He knew that Peter was probably right and something happened between Tyler and you again. But still, he wanted to calm his best friend.

“Okay, maybe you’re right but Y/N would’ve texted you if it was urgent. When her phone is off, then maybe she want’s to be alone.” Ned tried to sound convincing.

Peter looked out of the window and thought about what you’d do right now. He was the only one you talked to when you felt bad. 

Peter and you were best friends since you were children, you two talked about anything and everything. After 6 months, when a Spider bit him and gave him his powers, he was honest with you about him being Spider-Man. You were so amazed about how much he trusts you, that you decided to be honest with him too and told him about your real condition of your depression. 

At first you learned how to handle it on your own, still with some medication, but with the help of your family and friends and some happy days, you could’ve been “healed”. But as your relationship with Tyler started to become toxic, your depression became worse and the only person you talked about it with honesty was Peter, because he was always the one who tried to understand you and never judged you in anyway.

                                    ~*~

One Day later:

Peter and his Team had won the competition and made their way back to school. When he arrived at school, he expected you to wait for him already but no one was there. 

Peter decided to go to your house, to look for you. You didn’t live far away from Peter, just four blocks. You had a nice house, normal parents and besides the depression a good life.

Your parents loved Peter, they you’d rather see him as your boyfriend than Tyler, especially your Mom. She saw how you became somehow addicted to him and did nearly anything he wants. Sometimes she couldn’t recognize her own daughter, who was once so confident, wild and strong woman.

Peter ring the bell at the door and waited. He tried to stay calm, even when all he wanted to to was run into your house and look if you’re okay.

“Hello Peter, how was Washington?” Your Mother greeted him smiling.

Peter smiled soft. “It was good, Mrs. Y/L/N. Is Y/N at home?”

“Unfortunately not, shall I tell her something when she gets back?” 

Peter tried to cover his disappointment with a friendly smile. “Just tell her that I was here.”

Your mother nodded. “It was nice to see you. You can come on Saturday and eat dinner with us.” 

“It was nice to see you too and of course, I’ll be there!” 

Your mother smiled again, then she closed the door. Peter tried to think about all your favorite hiding spots and thought about on which of them he would look first. But he noticed that he still had his suitcase and should probably tell May that he’s back.

                                   ~*~

Peter made his way home, still thinking about if you’re alright and mostly where you could be.

“Hey Aunt May, I’m home!”

Nobody responded but Peter heard May singing in the shower. He chuckled a little. Not because her singing was bad but because he knew what was happening as soon as she comes out of the shower. May sang her favorite 80 or 90 songs always with passion, also really loud.. and every time she comes out of the shower, May would deny that she sang at all.

                                    ~*~

Peter went into his room and put his earphones in. He was listening to the Playlist you two created on Spotify, with nearly any genre in it.

He couldn’t believe his eyes as he saw no other but you, sitting on his bed with red eyes and red cheeks. You had climbed the fire escape up and sneaked into his room.

Peter pulled out his earphones. He saw that a tear, you were probably trying to hide, rolled down your face. You quickly wiped it away but noticed the look in Peter’s eyes.

He didn’t even had to hear what Tyler did again, he just wanted to go out and punch that guy in the face like he deserved it so many times.

Peter closed the door gently behind him. He put his suitcase down, then he walked over to you. 

“Hey, sweetie.” He greeted you and laid his arm around you. 

You let yourself fall into his lap and laid on his leg. He strokes your hair soft. Peter knew you’d talk when you were ready to. To force you to tell him something would just push him away, even when he wanted to help you, he knew that being there was enough for you.

                                     ~*~

You started to cry but made no noise. Thats how Peter knew it was really bad, you didn’t even sob. Just tears rolling down your face, on Peters Jeans.

“We fought again, same damn matter. I just can’t trust him and I probably never will.” You sighed.

Peter stroke your hair again. “I don’t know how much we talked about this and I don’t know how much I’ve to say this to you but Y/N, he cheated on you. Tyler did it physically and emotionally. He’ll always flirt with others and even if you don’t see it because he probably deletes it, he’ll always text with others.”

You knew Peter was right. It was the same your mom told you a hundred times.You knew that Tyler wasn’t good for you in anyway, maybe he once was but that was a long time ago. Now all that the relationship was giving you, were toxic thoughts.

“I don’t know why I can’t break up with him.. I try and I’m always just one step away but then, when i’m about to say it, I stop. I know you’re right and even when you think, I wouldn’t listen to you and do what I want anyways, I do listen and I know what I should do. I just don’t know whats wrong with me that I stay after everything he did.” You admitted

It hurt Peter to hearing you talk like this. He missed how happy you were before Tyler. How nobody could steal you confidence, how you had to tell him everything would be alright, when Flash locked him in a locker everyday.

“Tyler abused you with everything he did, it’s no wonder that you can’t trust him. I mean he has giving you no reason too. yes, he always say’s he’s sorry and promises to not do it again but in the end-”

“-It all starts again.” You finished Peters words.

“And the worst of all is, that he is the reason why you’re getting sicker. I noticed that you became a bit thinner. He stresses you so much that you forget to eat or can’t eat. Your depression grows because of him. The only reason why you won’t leave him is because of your fears.”

You got up and looked at him in confusion. You knew that he new about anxiety of being alone but you never told him about anything else.

“Y/N, I know you better than I know myself..” Peter hesitated to say what he really thought but he knew you had to learn it the hard way. “Maybe you feel like your identity is in him. Maybe you feel like you don’t understand what life would be like without him. Maybe you feel like you just can’t emotionally handle the change and everything is hitting you too fast, for you to even have a moment to breath. Maybe you feel that way. And if you do, you will live past it.”

You were surprised about his words. You two had a lot of talks about your situation with Tyler, how much he had hurt you and you told him a lot of times how you felt, when your depression was hitting you again. But never would you have ever thought that he actually understood your feelings better than you did.

His words, everything he said was the pure truth. This was how you felt, this were your fears and you had no idea how to overcome them.

“You’ll live past it and I’ll be with you every step of the way. I won’t leave you and I’ll also tell you this a hundred times more, hell, I’ll tell it a thousand times everyday if it helps. And if you don’t want to sleep alone, you know my window is always open. I’m hear and we’ll get through this.”

You started crying again. 

“No, no, no. Hush.” Peter said and took you into his arms. “What did I say, what did I do wrong? I’m sorry that I was so hard on you but-”

You looked at him with a smile. “You did nothing wrong, you did everything right, Parker.” You wiped your tears away and hugged him. “You’re the only person I believe when you say you won’t leave me and I’m happy to have you. Happy that you always listen, even when its the same shit all over again.”

Peter smiled and kissed the top of your head. “I’ll always be there for you.”

________________________

Sorry for the grammer mistakes, I’ll take care of them in a few days but I really wanted to post this. Hope you like it and leave some comments! <3

blog.name: iloveyouthree-thousand
blog.title: Peter You Outshine the Morning Sun, My Son
blog.description: My inbox is always open for requests / prompts / whatever your heart desires.

summary:
[Tony asks Peter for a favor]
They’re watching The Goonies (Tony’s choice).
The end credits appear, cueing Peter to roll from...
body:
[Tony asks Peter for a favor]

  • They’re watching The Goonies (Tony’s choice).
  • The end credits appear, cueing Peter to roll from his spot on the couch and whisper a sleepy goodnight to the man next to him.
  • “Wait—before you go to bed,” Tony yawns, reaching behind the couch to reveal a sleek charcoal box tied with a red bow.
  • Peter pauses, running through potential holidays in his head, confusion spreading in his hazy eyes.
  • “Just open it,” he prods.
  • Peter takes the box and examines it carefully, timidly pulling at the ribbon.
  • “You’re killing me, kid.”
  • The boy grins, casting aside his façade of decorum to remove the remaining packaging in one fluid and wholly ungraceful motion.
  • Inside, a pair of crimson-red suspenders and a matching bow tie rest around a slip of cardstock that simply reads: “suit up”.
  • “I know you usually prefer suits of the spandex and crime-fighting variety…”
  • Peter looks up at Tony, but his eyes are trained on the floor now, palm rubbing the back of his neck.
  • “…but I was hoping you could spare a night off to help me out at this party I’m throwing. Rhodey’s coming. Pepper too, probably in an expensive white dress…” 
  • In a flash, Peter is fully awake.
  • “…and before you get any ideas, you’d be a junior groomsman, so no open bar and definitely no bachelor party, but for all the other stuff… well, I’d like you to be there.”
  • Peter doesn’t say anything for a beat, just sits and stares at the box that suddenly feels so much heavier in his hands.
  • “Pete, you know I get anxious when you’re quiet.”
  • “Sorry… I’m just, wow, Mr. Stark.”
  • Peter smiles sheepishly.
  • “I’ve never even been to a wedding before, much less in one… I’m not sure that, I mean, I’d love to, of course, but I don’t know if…”
  • Tony cuts him off with a hand on his shoulder, pulling the nervous teen closer to him.
  • “You’ll do great, kid. Promise. And there’s not another spiderling on this planet I’d want up there at that altar with me instead, okay?”
  • Peter nods, relaxing into Tony’s rare embrace.
  • “Okay,” he concedes, smiling lightly.
  • “But remember, when I screw something up… you’re the one who asked for this.”

tags: if any more of ya'll get this
so cute! thanks for sending this
summary: Were you the one that had the keychains?? I think I saw it on your page. This is what we got 😍 lowkey wanted flying spider....
caption:
Were you the one that had the keychains?? I think I saw it on your page. This is what we got 😍 lowkey wanted flying spider. (submitted by @ap93mcu)

madmadmilk: THAT’S SOOOOOO CUTE!!! u got a sweet father-son pair haha! and yeah that one is so cute!! i got the two that i wanted :)

summary: may and tony are co parents
body:
may and tony are co parents

may and tony like to hang out of thursday’s like talking about each others day and how stressful the week has been. they also talk about important things like peter, his grades and school life.

on friday it’s family outing. may, tony, PEPPER, and peter eat out at normal restaurants. none of the top, $10000 worth of food. (like the thai place in HC)

if there’re field trips may can’t sign or attend to she turns it over to pepped, making sure to have her sign it and not tony. who’s gonna believe that tony FUCKING stark signed a 14 year old permission slip.

tony is always the 3rd option, surprisingly. even though pepper is one of the most busiest woman may has ever seen, she has yet to fully trust tony. pepper always tries to make time for peter and the co-parent work. if pepper can’t make it may turns to tony.
